title: Mushikago no Cagaster (Cagaster of an Insect Cage)
synopsis: In a near future, an illness called "Cagaster" made ​​its appearance. It turns humans into insects. The story begins 30 years after the onset of the illness, in 2125. It follows the adventures of Kidou, a boy who fights insects.
voices: ['Hosoya, Yoshimasa', 'Hanae, Natsuki', 'Hanazawa, Kana', 'Morikawa, Toshiyuki', 'Namikawa, Daisuke', 'Kayano, Ai', 'Mamiya, Yasuhiro', 'Kitou, Akari']
staff: [['Chigira, Kouichi', ['Director']], ['Kuroishi, Hitomi', ['Theme Song Arrangement', ' Theme Song Performance', ' Theme Song Lyrics', ' Theme Song Composition']], ['Hilcrhyme', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Hashimoto, Kachou', ['Original Creator']]]
